vsParam:
This is the "Time Reversal", right...?
Thank you, [px]!

With this...!
I think I can revive the Tyrant Puni!

Hmm, it's actually pretty simple.
We use this item on the remains of the Tyrant Puni.

On the remains...?
Revive it with its remains?

That's right. I've asked Amaryllis why the Tyrant Punis
were relentlessly hunted by pirates.

I was told it's because of the special Puniball
dropped from them.

So it means that we just need to use the
"Time Reversal" on this special Puniball...!

And then we can revive the Tyrant Puni...!?
I see! You've really thought it through, Lydie.

I'm flattered.
I don't know if it will work...
Plus, we must first obtain the special Puniball...

Okay, so this is our first step...
Hmm, but how to get it...

I've checked with Amaryllis! She said that the hideout
of the Ancient Pirates is still on the Kanaris Coast!

Ah, is it...?
Your investigation is really thorough, Lydie...

I'm doing all these for the sake of the "Love Story"!
So, let's defeat the pirates and get the special Puniball!

Alright, let's go, [px]!
For the "Love Story"~!!

To revive the Tyrant Puni...!
Let's go to the Kanaris Coast, [px]!
